name: Addtim
tagline: mobile application development android ios cp
description:
Founded in 2010, Addtim’s mission is to help small businesses to prosper in an increasingly convoluted and evolving world. 
Addtim packs together the technologies that any business needs to succeed. Our goals are to add huge values to our partners, customers and employees by focusing on the requirements of small businesses & providing with the best solutions. We specialize in developing web and mobile applications.
Our engineers focus and take good care of your requirements from start to finish.  
With our long-term expertise in developing bespoke software applications, we assure on time service to our valued clients.
